```{r aesthetics, echo=FALSE}

theme(theme_classic)

```

```{r read data, echo=FALSE}

full <- read.csv("Full_List.csv")

```

```{r plotty, echo=FALSE}

a <- full %>%
  group_by(Sex) %>%
  summarise(
    meanAge = mean(Age)
  )


a %>%
  ggplot(
    aes(
      x = Sex,
      y = meanAge,
      color = Sex,
      fill = Sex,
      group = Sex,
    )
  ) + geom_bar(
    stat = "identity",
    position = "dodge"
  )

```
